channel.title: Is this safe?
channel.description:
my dad is being A *##$%&* #@@ hole and saying that this PORT FORWARDING isnt safe because people can "Hack" into our computer, because your opening a port for them to get into, i need people to post on this saying Reasons why this is safe and where there getting connected to, cause he says there connecting to my computer and they could get into my files and stuff,
Plese Help,

item.title: Is this safe?
item.dc:creator: @itzkyle Lusfr
item.description:
@itzkyle wrote:

It’s Safe because all any of these people do is connect a cline t throught your port and ports are used for more stuff like you have port that are always open , and if somone want to hack you they would. opening one port is not bad since you already have over 5 ports open to the internet at all times.
